title: Timing and Psychology Are Everything When Bargain Hunting
text:
AMG, ADS, AMTD, AYI, CI, CTSH, FDX, GEF, HSII, INGR, MSM, NCLH, OXY, PLCE, QRTEA, SCHW, SPG, TEX, TILE, QQQ, SPY Stocks quotes in this article: AAWW

Real Money Pro's own expert Helene Meisler, author of the "Top Stocks" column, published a great chart Thursday showing that the Dow Jones industrial average plunge on Tuesday and Wednesday took us to the most oversold reading since the Christmas Eve Capitulation last DecemberThat doesn't mean we'll have an instant 180-degree turnaround, as we saw...
description: When you're the most bummed out about how much you've lost, so is everybody else, and that's when they're willing to part with even the best stocks at really low prices....AAWW
authors: Psychology Are Everything When Bargain Hunting
When You'Re The Most Bummed Out About How Much You'Ve Lost
That'S When They'Re Willing To Part With Even The Best Stocks At Really Low Prices.
